document.full_text: smoke billowing from an equipment elevator at a new hampshire nuclear plant briefly triggered an "unusual event" on monday but did not impact operations or affect any employees, officials said.
document.title: smoke seen, controlled at new hampshire nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: smoke billowing from an equipment elevator at a new hampshire nuclear plant briefly triggered an "unusual event" on monday but did not impact operations or affect any employees, officials said.
